text: Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ke daur mein sanati islahat aur factories ki qaumi milkiyat mein muntaqili ne Mian Sharif ko ek gehra sabak sikhaya. Jab unka Ittefaq Group bhi is qadam ki zad mein aaya aur unka tamam karobar hukoomati milkiyat mein chala gaya, tab unhein ehsaas hua ke Pakistan mein sirf mehnat aur ahliyat se karobar ko badhana aur mehfooz rakhna mumkin nahi. Siyasi asro-rasooq aur ikhtedar ka hona bhi nihayat zaroori hai. Is waqiye ne unke liye ek 'watershed moment' ka kaam kiya, jahan unhone yeh pakka irada kar liya ke woh khud nahi to apne khandan ke kisi fard ko siyasat mein zaroor utarenge taake aainda aisi mushkilat se bach saken aur apne karobar ko mustaqil tahaffuz faraham kar saken. Yeh faisla Sharif khandan ki siyasat mein entry ki bunyad bana.

step_heading: Zia-ul-Haq ki Himayat se Siyasi Safar ka Aaghaz
text: Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ki hukoomat ke ikhtetam aur General Zia-ul-Haq ke ikhtedar mein aane ke baad Sharif khandan ko siyasat mein dakhil hone ka sunahra mauqa mila. General Zia-ul-Haq, jo Bhutto jese maqbool leader ko farigh karne ke baad apni saakh bahal karna chahte the, unhein karobari logon ki himayat ki zaroorat thi. Lahore ke Governor Punjab General Ghulam Jilani ne Mian Sharif aur Nawaz Sharif ki mulaqat General Zia-ul-Haq se karwai. Is mulaqat ke natije mein Nawaz Sharif ko Punjab hukoomat mein wazir-e-khazana ka ohda mila. Yeh aik siyasi rishte ka aaghaz tha jahan Sharif khandan aur military establishment dono aik doosre ki zaroorat ban gaye. Is tarah Nawaz Sharif ne siyasat mein apna pehla qadam rakha, jo unke mustaqbil ke siyasi safar ki bunyad bana aur unki taqat mein izafe ka sabab bana.

step_heading: Sarkari Idaron mein Wafadaron ki Bharti
text: Wazir-e-khazana se Wazir-e-Aala banne ke baad, Nawaz Sharif ne apni siyasi saltanat qaim karne ke liye hukoomati machinery mein apna jaal bichana shuru kar diya. Unhone yeh samajh liya tha ke agar unhein apni hukoomat mustahkam karni hai to unhein aise wafadar log chahiye honge jin ki loyalty sirf Sharif khandan ke saath ho, na ke system ke saath. 1985 se 1993 tak, Mian brothers ne taqreeban 15,000 se zaid Assistant Sub Inspectors aur 800 ke qareeb Tehsildar aur Naib Tehsildar siyasi buniyadon par bharti kiye. Yeh bhartiyan Public Service Commission ke imtehanat ke bagair ki gayin. Is qadam se Punjab ke siyasi gharanon ke supporters aur hukoomati ahlkaron ka aik bara network PML-N ka ehsanmand ho gaya, jo aainda saalon mein Sharif khandan ki siyasi taqat ka bunyadi setun (pillar) bana aur unke ikhtedar ko mazboot kiya.

step_heading: Adliya mein Mudakhlat aur Marzi ke Faisle
text: Sharif khandan ne na sirf intizamia mein apne wafadar bharti kiye balkay adliya mein bhi apna asar-o-rasookh qaim kiya. Is ki sab se barri misal Chief Justice Sajjad Ali Shah ko unke ohde se hatane ka waqia hai. Nawaz Sharif ne 2/3 majority se Wazir-e-Azam banne ke baad, adliya mein apne hamdard judges ko active kiya, jinhon ne Chief Justice ke khilaf baghawat kar di. Justice Syeduz Zaman Siddiqui aur Justice Malik Qayyum jese judges ne Sharif khandan ke liye kaam kiya, jinhon ne marzi ke faisle diye aur unke siyasi maqasid ki takmeel ki. Justice Malik Qayyum ki leaked phone calls mein woh Shahbaz Sharif se instructions lete nazar aate hain ke kis muqadme mein kis ko kitni saza sunani hai. Is tarah, Sharif khandan ne adliya ko bhi apne control mein rakhne ki koshish ki, taake unke khilaf koi bhi qanooni rukawat na ban sake aur unke karobari aur siyasi mafadat mehfooz rahen.

step_heading: Media ko Control Karne ki Koshish
text: Sharif khandan ne media ko bhi control karne ki bharpoor koshish ki. Unhein sirf khushamdi sahafiyon se taawun pasand tha. 1997 mein, Nawaz Sharif ki hukoomat ne Jang Group ke malik Mir Shakeel-ur-Rehman par dabao dala ke woh hukoomati line to karen aur 14 sahafiyon ko idaray se farigh kar den jo tanqeed karte the. Mir Shakeel-ur-Rehman ne Karachi Press Club mein aik press conference mein is dabao ki record call bhi sunai. Isi tarah, Najam Sethi, jinhon ne BBC ki documentary mein Nawaz Sharif par tanqeed ki thi, unke ghar par IB aur Punjab Police ne raid kiya, unhein hirasat mein liya gaya aur unpar tashaddud bhi kiya gaya. Yeh waqiyat zahir karte hain ke Sharif khandan media ki aazadi ko bardasht nahi karta tha aur tanqeed karne walon ko dabane ke liye har hathkanda istemal karta tha, taake unki siyasi tasweer saaf rahe aur unke khilaf koi aawaz na uth sake.

step_heading: Money Laundering aur Cases ka Khatma
text: Shahbaz Sharif aur unke khandan par money laundering ke sangeen ilzamat lage, jahan 2008 se 2018 ke darmiyan unke aur 40 afraad ke bank accounts mein bahir mulk se telephonic transactions (TTs) ke zariye karoron rupay transfer kiye gaye. FIA ki report ke mutabiq, in 10 saalon mein 17,000 deposits hue, jismein taqreeban 1.3 billion rupay Sharif khandan se munsalik accounts mein transfer kiye gaye. Yeh ilzamat the ke kala dhan pehle hundi ke zariye bahir bheja jata tha aur phir jaali accounts ke zariye wapas Pakistan laya jata tha, jismein 'Maqsood Chaprasi' jese chote darje ke mulazmeen ke naam par accounts khole gaye. 2022 mein, jab Shahbaz Sharif aur Hamza Shahbaz par fard-e-jurm aaid hone wali thi, tab mulk ki siyasi surat-e-haal tabdeel ho gayi aur FIA ke prosecutor Sikandar Zulkarnain ko is case se peechay hatne ka kaha gaya, jis ke natije mein yeh case dab gaya aur phir khatam kar diya gaya. Is se zahir hota hai ke kaise siyasi ikhtedar ka istemal qanooni karwaiyon ko roknay ke liye kiya gaya.

step_heading: Siyasat ka Asal Maqsad: Khandani Karobar ka Tahaffuz
text: Sharif khandan ki siyasat mein entry ka bunyadi maqsad kabhi bhi khidmat-e-khalq nahi tha, balkay apne khandani karobar ka tahaffuz aur usay phulana phulana tha. Pehle din se unka yeh vision bilkul wazeh tha. Jab bhi unhein mushkilat pesh aayin, unhone mulk ke khatir uska samna karne ke bajaye woh rasta apnaya jisse woh aur unka khandan mehfooz rahen. Kabhi woh Saudi Arab mein khamoshi ki zindagi guzarne chale gaye, to kabhi London mein side-line ho gaye. Lekin jis maqsad ke liye woh siyasat mein aaye the, usse kabhi peeche nahi hate. Khandani karobar ko kabhi nuksan nahi hone diya. Unki tamam siyasi karwaiyan, adliya aur media par asar-o-rasookh, aur sarkari idaron mein wafadaron ki bharti, sab isi maqsad ke gird ghoomti thin ke unki siyasi saltanat aur karobari samrajya mustahkam rahe, aur unka business hamesha phalta phoolta rahe, chahe uske liye koi bhi siyasi qadam uthana pare.
